Contact Us

For inquiries regarding ACM SIGGRAPH VRCAI 2025, please contact us through the following channels:


Email

General inquiries: wxwang@must.edu.mo

Address

Faculty of Information Technology

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I register for the conference?

Registration details are available on the Registration page. But now it is not open. Please wait.

Is there an accommodation discount for conference attendees?

Yes, we have negotiated special rates with several hotels near the venue. Please visit the Venue page for more information.

Can I get an invitation letter for visa purposes?

Yes, after completing your registration, you can request an invitation letter by emailing wxwang@must.edu.mo with your registration details and passport information.

Will the conference proceedings be published?

Yes, accepted papers will be published in the ACM Digital Library and indexed by Scopus and Web of Science.
